title: Tell me about an unexpected event that happened to you. How did you react?

korean: 생일날 친구들이 서프라이즈 파티 준비해 준 게 정말 감동이었어.
그날은 평소처럼 회사 가서 일하고 있었는데, 특별할 게 없었어.
친한 친구한테 저녁 먹자는 연락이 와서, 그냥 일반 저녁 약속인 줄 알았어.
약속 장소에 도착했는데, 친구가 조금만 기다리라고 하더라고.
문 열고 들어가는 순간, 불이 확 켜지면서 사람들이 우르르 나타났어.
생일 축하한다고 다 같이 소리 지르는데, 진짜 깜짝 놀랐어.
친구들이 케이크랑 선물까지 준비해 놔서 눈물 날 뻔했어.
몰래 준비하느라 얼마나 고생했을까 싶어서 너무 고마웠어.
케이크에 초 끄면서 소원 빌었는데, 이런 친구들 계속 만나길 바랐어.
같이 밥 먹고 술 마시면서 정말 행복한 시간 보냈어.
선물 뜯어보니 내가 갖고 싶어 했던 거라 놀랐어, 내 말 다 기억하고 있었어.
그날 밤에 집에 오면서 정말 감사하다는 생각이 들었어, 평생 잊지 못할 거야.
english: So I was honestly really touched and emotional when my friends secretly prepared a surprise birthday party for me.
That particular day started out just like any other day - I went to the office and was working as usual, nothing seemed special at all.
Then in the afternoon, one of my close friends texted me asking if I wanted to grab dinner together, and I thought it was just a regular casual dinner plan.
When I arrived at the meeting place, which was actually someone's apartment, my friend told me to wait just a moment before going in.
The instant I opened the door and stepped inside, all the lights suddenly came on and a whole group of people appeared from different corners.
Everyone shouted "Happy Birthday!" together in perfect unison, and I was so shocked I literally froze in place.
My friends had prepared this beautiful cake and individually wrapped presents, and I honestly almost started crying right there.
I felt so incredibly grateful thinking about how hard they must have worked planning and preparing everything in secret.
While blowing out the candles on the cake with everyone gathered around, I made a wish to keep having amazing friends like these in my life forever.
We all sat down together and ate delicious food and drank, and honestly had such a wonderfully happy time celebrating.
When I finally opened all the presents, I was genuinely surprised because they were exactly what I had mentioned wanting - they had remembered every little thing I said.
On my way home later that night, I kept feeling waves of gratitude washing over me.
This surprise party reminded me how lucky I am to have such thoughtful and caring friends.
I know I'll honestly never forget that special night for as long as I live, you know?
